Articles.Content:
The SU-182 is the most stable craft from Halco Industries yet, with amazing manuverability and speed, this is a revolutionary plane. The SU-182 has a short takeoff and fast landing, it can take a few hits from stock missiles and can carry stock missiles too! currently unarmed because I lost the missile subasembly and haven't made a new one, but it's amazing!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download: http://www./download/257pfze8bx86ki7/SU-182.craft

EDIT: Download fixed, dang mediafire is glitching today.

Please don't edit this craft too much, it's my favorite plane from Halco Industries.

Edited November 21, 2014 by Kozak
